sample_text: Each Founder equity shall vest over 48 months, with 12-month cliff. At cliff, 25% vests immediately, remaining 75% vests monthly over 36 months.
During this Agreement and for 12 months following termination, Founder shall not engage in competing business within India.

standard_terms: All work product belongs to company
sample_text: Founder assigns to Company all right, title and interest in all Inventions and IP created during the term of this Agreement.
